entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
